meta.description: Minimize the cost of providing a diet that meets nutritional requirements for workers.

sets.name: FOODS
sets.description: Types of food available for the diet.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost of each type of food.

params.name: calories
params.description: Calories provided by each type of food.

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein in grams provided by each type of food.

params.name: carbs
params.description: Carbohydrates in grams provided by each type of food.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of servings of each type of food.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of the diet.

constraints.name: calories_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 2200 calories are provided.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 50 grams of protein are provided.

constraints.name: carbs_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 70 grams of carbohydrates are provided.
